column4: ok when i add a new user they don't have any permissions to their home folder but they can view files outside their home folder but not in. ive tried chown user /home/user to the user and its still not working. any help?

ok when i add a new user they don't have any permissions to their home folder but they can view files outside their home folder but not in. ive tried chown user /home/user to the user and its still not working. any help?
is any one here any good with unix file permissions?
